history.proof: intros a b c d nZc nZd Hab Hcd. unfold eqTerm in *. hauto q: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros a b c d nZc nZd Hab Hcd.
exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

ctx: intros a b c d nZc nZd Hab Hcd.
exceptions.exn: Illegal application: The term "divTerm" of type "Term A n -> forall b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> Term A n" cannot be applied to the terms "b" : "Term A n" "x" : "Term A n" "y" : "Term A n" The 3rd term has type "Term A n" which should be coercible to "~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x".

original: intros a b c d nZc nZd Hab Hcd. unfold eqTerm in *. rewrite Hab, Hcd. reflexivity.
